channel.title: Twinkle In The Cosmos--Osharu Perez [EDM/GlitchHop, Collab?, Project]
channel.description:
I have trouble with this one song, titled, "Twinkle In The Cosmos, and I can't figure out what it is!! Here is the project file so anyone who's willing to help me, can have a go at it: https://app.auxy.co/projects/U5iPvk0G6212KFOtnL1U8w==
No remixes, I just want help with this song to try an make it sound right.... Remixes are cool and all, but they just don't help me that much when creating new content...
